description: React component for instructor Q&A management, listing questions, and allowing answers.

methods.name: InstructorQA
methods.description: React functional component for managing instructor's Q&A interface.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches courses and related questions for the instructor.

methods.name: startAnswer
methods.description: Initiates editing mode for a specific question.

methods.name: saveAnswer
methods.description: Saves the answer to a question via database update.
